sentences.en: A lady always sits quietly with her hands in her lap.
sentences.cn: 淑女端坐时总是双手放在膝上，不发一言。

sentences.en: an heiress living in the lap of luxury.
sentences.cn: 一位生活奢华的女继承人

sentences.en: As I completed my 26th lap the Porsche puffed blue smoke.
sentences.cn: 我跑了26圈时，保时捷车冒出了蓝烟。

sentences.en: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

sentences.en: By the third lap Kinkead had touched 289 m.p.h.
sentences.cn: 到第三圈时，金基德的车速达到了每小时289英里。

sentences.en: He bent to a squat and gathered the puppies on his lap.
sentences.cn: 他弯腰蹲下，把小狗们都抱到自己腿上。

sentences.en: Her hands twisted in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她的手在膝头扭绞着。

sentences.en: Hugh glanced at the child on her mother's lap.
sentences.cn: 休瞥了一眼坐在她妈妈膝上的小女孩。

sentences.en: It lapped milk from a dish.
sentences.cn: 它从一个盘子里舐食牛奶。

sentences.en: lapping up praise.
sentences.cn: 爱听表扬话

sentences.en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentences.en: Rubens Barrichello finished a lap ahead of his team-mate.
sentences.cn: 鲁本斯·巴里切罗领先队友一圈跑完全程。

sentences.en: Shannon sat on her mother’s lap.
sentences.cn: 香农坐在她妈妈的腿上。

sentences.en: She clasped her hands together on her lap.
sentences.cn: 她十指紧扣，放在膝上。

sentences.en: she dumped the problem &B{in my lap}.
sentences.cn: 她把这个问题推到了我身上。

sentences.en: She lowered her gaze to the hands in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她低头盯着放在大腿上的双手。

sentences.en: She placed her hands palm uppermost in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她把手掌心向上放在大腿上。

sentences.en: She waited quietly with her hands in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她双手放在大腿上静静地等候。

sentences.en: The baby was wriggling around on my lap.
sentences.cn: 婴儿在我大腿上扭来扭去。

sentences.en: The tide was lapping the harbour wall.
sentences.cn: 潮水拍打着港口的防汛墙。

sentences.en: The two pictures are made to lap over each other.
sentences.cn: 两幅照片是搭接在一起的.

sentences.en: Their audience will lap up whatever they throw at them.
sentences.cn: 不管是什么节目，他们的观众都照单全收。

sentences.en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentences.cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。

sentences.en: women fall at his feet, power falls into his lap.
sentences.cn: 女人拜倒在他脚下，权柄降到他的身上。

phrases.tran_cn: 赤鱲角（俗称赤腊角，香港西部海域的一个岛屿）
（好事）轻而易举得到，得来全不费功夫

phrases.phrase: in the lap of the gods
phrases.tran_cn: （计划或事件的成败）听天由命
游泳比赛中一次来回所需之时间
奢华：极度富裕或舒适物质生活的状态

trans.tran_cn: （坐着时的）大腿部，（跑道等的）一圈，（行程或工作中的）一段
trans.tran_en: the upper part of your legs when you are sitting down

trans.tran_cn: 拍打，舔（食），领先一圈（或数圈）
trans.tran_en: if water laps something or laps against something such as the shore or a boat, it moves against it or hits it in small waves
